directions: Heat 1 cup of almond milk on the stove or in the microwave until steaming. Mix cocoa powder into hot almond milk.
Pour mixture into mug before adding 2 ounces of Baileys Almande.
Garnish with dairy-free whipped topping or slivered almonds if desired.
ingredients: Optional: dairy-free whipped topping or slivered almonds
